content: {"name": "LindaBen Foundation / Word of Faith Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food pantry is only by appointment https://signup.com/client/invitation2/secure/65983176057/false#/invitation Sign up with this link to book your appointment with day and time for food or text to 240) 461-9442 for appointment", "email": "", "url": "https://www.lindabenfoundation.org/programs", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5100 Tanglewood Drive", "address_2": "Edmonston Recreation Center", "city": "Hyattsville", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20781", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9512161, "longitude": -76.92925149999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(240) 461-9442", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
